body: Also can't believe this is 7 years old now - remember reading this a long time ago, still just as fantastic. Shame the doujin that this is a sequel of isn't on nhentai, bit of a pain to have to head to another site but oh well.

I know all the comments about are dated heavily, but for anyone else reading in the future that has the same misconception of him being inside a box for a year - he has not. She only kept him on the edge without cumming for a whole year - which is cruel and sadistic of course, but she's not just completely taken away his life and kept him in a box for a year in case you somehow thought so.

Llege a pensar que ella era una santa... a diferencia de su amiga. Te me caiste, eres peor que tu amiga. Manteniendo encerrado a un chico, en una caja, por un año. No te pases autor, eso si es otro lvl xD
This is to much im pretty sure shes Satan as a girl

Yeah she is evil. But she warned the guy serveral times as well. She told him that she will definitely break him because she cannot control her sadism. She said that the longer they stay together the worse it will get until he is unable to function at all.

NO NO NO NO NO! Even if I'm a M guy, this shit is insane! One year of orgasm control in a box? There's no way anyone can endure that. And even if I'm into sadistic girls, this chick is scary af. She is evil.

This story is a continuation of a prior one. It was sort of a visual novel/choose your own adventure manga if the choice was the 1st instead of the 2nd one. It was this title:
[Akai Mato]1[Fukadume Kizoku -A Relationship about Orgasm Control [English]
very intense too... :3
what the f did i just see?
He's inside the box for a year?
If just for one mount a girl do that to me and dont let me fuck her i would have just break up this guy is in this shit for a fucking year
